sentences.english: Climate change and the depleted ozone layer are among the starkest examples.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和臭氧层耗减就是其中最明显的例子。

sentences.english: The intensity of near-earth ultraviolet(UV)radiation is increasing with the spoilage of ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 由于臭氧层损耗，使地球表面的紫外线辐射量增加。

sentences.english: 'Nothing's wrong with he satellite, ' Kiah answered quietly. 'It's AOL.
sentences.chinese: “卫星没问题，”凯平静地回答，“是人工臭氧层。”

sentences.english: Climate change is bringing mixed news to the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化带给臭氧层的消息是喜忧掺半的。

sentences.english: You don't know how to fix the holes in our ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 你们不知道该如何填补臭氧层的破洞吧？

sentences.english: The size and shape of the ozone hole is shown in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图片上的阴影显示的是2009年的臭氧层空洞。

sentences.english: Avoid using ozone destructive substances as cleaning agents for protecting global environment.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用破坏臭氧层的清洗剂以保护环境。

sentences.english: Curbing nitrous oxide emissions would enhance the ozone layer's recovery.
sentences.chinese: 抑制氧化亚氮的排放将会促进臭氧层的恢复。

sentences.english: But man-made nitrous oxide is now the elephant in the room among ozone-depleting substances.
sentences.chinese: 但人为的一氧化二氮现在成了主要的臭氧层破坏物质。

sentences.english: And you end up with the destruction of the ozone layer.
The clouds form surfaces where chemical reactions can take place that produce ozone-destroying molecules.
sentences.chinese: 在这种云表面化学反应会产生一种破坏臭氧层的分子。

sentences.english: Methyl bromide is one of the most widely used fumigants in the world and is one of ozone-depleting substances.
sentences.chinese: 甲基溴是一种多用途的广谱熏蒸剂和消耗臭氧层物质。

sentences.english: She is so fat, they're going to use her to fill that hole in the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 她太胖乐，科学家们准备用她来填补臭氧层空洞。

sentences.english: CH4, with a net lifetime of 10 years, can also degrade the ozone layer.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷，虽然净寿命只有10年，却可以破坏臭氧层。

sentences.english: The ozone layer protects life on earth from harmful ultra-violet rays.
sentences.chinese: 臭氧层保护地球上的生命免受有害紫外线的辐射。

sentences.english: For ozone depletion, we don't use Freon -discharging products.
sentences.chinese: 对臭氧层破坏，我们不用要氟利昂的产品。

definition: global warming (PRC usage)/written 全球暖化 in Taiwan

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3
